lastfm.summary: "Wish I Knew You" is a song by American rock band the Revivalists. The song was written by the band and was produced by Ben Ellman. It peaked at #1 on the Adult Alternative Chart and has since crossed over to the Alternative Chart, where it reached #1 as well. It was also certified platinum by RIAA in September 2018 and was nominated for Alternative Rock Song of the Year by the iHeartRadio Music Awards in 2018. David Shaw, the vocalist of the band, spoke with Galore Magazine about the meaning behind the song: Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Wish I Knew You
